TopicTitle: Let Kaptain Keval Kneival be an update so any player can select the pilot Kerbal with that name and just do crazy tricks

Articles.Content:
I think it would be fun for an optional and somewhat monster truck event style game play where the planets can be used to "break records" and perform tricks.

Edited February 12, 2021 by KaptainKevalKneival
I think you should take a look at some of @Triop's work in KSP, among others, they already do a lot of that type of stuff.
Ehm... you should probably change that name, as KSP, and its mods and players do like using acronyms.

Well yah I was trying to emulate part of our reality by modding in Konsumables.

 

it got to the point where you kind of needed to use onion staged Orion drives as boosters just to get the entire ship to get out of a 250km orbit to Jool ,  so yah, it got kind of ridiculous. And even then they used up all the onboard Konsumables a couple of weeks before they got home.
